Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
struct stSlimTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::tSlimHeader

This structure defines the SlimTree header structure. This type was left public to allow the creation of debug tools.

template<class ObjectType , class EvaluatorType >
char stSlimTree< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::tSlimHeader::Magic[4]

Magic number. This is a short string that must contains the magic string "SLIM". It may be used to validate the file (this feature is not implemented yet).
